signup.title: Join HeyDoc
signup.subtitle: Start earning by helping patients on your own schedule
signup.bioPlaceholder: Tell patients about your background and approach to care...

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.selectSpecialty: Please select at least one specialty
validation.bioMaxLength: Bio must be 250 characters or less
validation.emailInUse: An account with this email already exists

login.title: Doctor Sign In
login.subtitle: Access your physician dashboard
login.accessDashboard: Access your dashboard to manage consultations, view earnings, and help patients.
login.earnPerCaseDesc: Standard cases pay $20, priority requests pay $36
login.weeklyPayoutsDesc: Automatic deposits every Monday via Stripe
login.noAccountFound: No doctor account found with this email. Please sign up first.
login.accountSuspended: Your account has been suspended. Please contact support.

pending.title: Application Under Review
pending.message: Thank you for applying to join HeyDoc! Our team is reviewing your credentials and license information. This typically takes 1-2 business days.
pending.step1: We verify your medical license with the state board
pending.step2: A member of our team reviews your application
pending.step3: You'll receive an email once you're approved
pending.step4: Set up Stripe Connect and start accepting cases!

rejected.title: Application Not Approved
rejected.message: Unfortunately, we were unable to approve your application at this time.
rejected.reviewDocuments: Review your submitted documents for accuracy
rejected.contactIfError: Contact us if you believe this was an error

suspended.title: Account Suspended
suspended.message: Your doctor account has been suspended. Please contact support for more information.

dashboard.title: Doctor Dashboard
dashboard.availableMessage: You're visible to patients and can receive cases.
dashboard.unavailableMessage: You're currently offline. Toggle availability to start receiving cases.
dashboard.priorityAlertDesc: A patient specifically requested you. Accept within 5 minutes to earn $36.
dashboard.noCasesInQueue: No cases in queue right now
dashboard.acceptCaseToStart: Accept a case to start helping patients

queue.title: Case Queue
queue.subtitle: Accept cases to start helping patients
queue.emptyDesc: New cases will appear here when patients request help.
queue.priorityDesc: Priority requests from patients who choose you specifically will appear here.
queue.declineConfirm: Are you sure you want to decline this request? The patient will be refunded.

active.title: Active Cases
active.subtitle: Cases you're currently working on
active.emptyDesc: Accept a case from the queue to start helping patients.

history.title: Case History
history.subtitle: View your completed consultations
history.emptyDesc: Your completed consultations will appear here.

completeModal.title: Complete Consultation
completeModal.notesPlaceholder: Add any notes about this consultation...
completeModal.ratingPrompt: The patient will be asked to rate their experience
completeModal.earningsAdded: Your earnings will be added to your balance
completeModal.payoutProcessed: Payout is processed automatically on Monday

earnings.title: Earnings
earnings.subtitle: Track your consultations and payouts
earnings.connectBankMessage: To view earnings and receive payouts, you need to connect your bank account via Stripe.
earnings.firstPayoutOn: Your first payout will be on {{date}}
earnings.taxDocumentsDesc: Stripe will automatically generate your 1099 form at the end of the year if you earn more than $600. You can access it from your

instantTransferModal.title: Instant Transfer
instantTransferModal.fundsDeposited: Your funds will be deposited to your connected bank account within minutes.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your professional information
profile.contactSupportToUpdate: Contact support to update your license
profile.bioPlaceholder: Tell patients about your background and approach to care...
profile.availableDesc: When enabled, you'll appear in the case queue and can receive new consultations.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your notification preferences and account

notifications.title: Email Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Choose which emails you'd like to receive
notifications.emailNewCaseDesc: Get notified when a new case is added to your queue
notifications.emailCaseAssignedDesc: Notification when a priority case is assigned to you
notifications.emailPayoutSentDesc: Confirmation when your weekly payout is processed
notifications.emailWeeklyDigestDesc: Summary of your weekly cases and earnings

push.title: Push Notifications
push.subtitle: Real-time alerts on your device
push.pushNewCaseDesc: Instant notification when cases become available
push.pushMessagesDesc: Alert when a patient sends you a message

account.title: Account
account.helpSupportDesc: Contact us with questions or issues

logoutModal.title: Sign Out?
logoutModal.message: Are you sure you want to sign out of your account?

stripe.title: Connect Your Bank Account
stripe.subtitle: To receive payments for consultations, you need to connect your bank account via Stripe.

connected.title: Stripe Connected!
connected.message: Your bank account is connected. You'll receive automatic payouts every Monday.

success.title: Successfully Connected!
success.message: Your Stripe account is now connected. You can start accepting cases and earning money.

connect.secureFastPayments: Secure, fast payments directly to your bank account
connect.automaticPayoutsDesc: Receive your earnings every Monday automatically
connect.instantTransfersDesc: Get paid immediately for a small $2 fee
connect.bankSecurityDesc: Your financial data is encrypted and secure
connect.taxFormsDesc: Stripe generates your tax documents automatically
connect.termsAgreement: By connecting, you agree to Stripe's
connect.completeOnboarding: Please complete the Stripe onboarding process.
connect.connectionFailed: Failed to connect with Stripe. Please try again.
